HediffDef.label: Emergency
HediffDef.description: I'm on my way!

HediffDef.label: Medigel
HediffDef.description: Natural regeneration is being expedited by a powerful topical medicine, also greatly improving general respiratory functions.

HediffDef.label: Medicinal Cooking
HediffDef.description: Specially-prepared medicinal food is greatly improving general respiratory functions and improving resistance to illness.

HediffDef.label: Combat Stims
HediffDef.description: An emergency battlefield stimulant is greatly reducing pain and granting rapidly increased natural regeneration and bodily functions for a moderate duration.

HediffDef.label: Serum Overload
HediffDef.description: The Super Soldier has injected a drug into their veins which has overcharged the effects of the serum in their body for a short time at the cost of some of their long-term development.

HediffDef.label: Tiny Band-aid
HediffDef.description: It's got a dinosaur sticker on it.

HediffDef.label: Old Wives' Chant
HediffDef.description: The pawn has been slightly weirded out by someone saying strange things near them.

HediffDef.label: Mystic Potion
HediffDef.description: Natural regeneration is being expedited by a powerful potion, and general bodily functions have been increased.

HediffDef.label: Combat Drugs (painkiller)
HediffDef.description: Administered painkillers are hardening the body and dulling sensitivity.

HediffDef.label: Combat Drugs (stimulants)
HediffDef.description: Administered stimulants are increasing movement speed and general dexterity.

HediffDef.label: Combat Drugs (awareness)
HediffDef.description: Administered combat drugs are improving various senses, improving overall awareness.

HediffDef.label: Combat Drugs (accuracy)
HediffDef.description: Administered drugs are improving their general aiming capabilities.

HediffDef.label: Somnolence
HediffDef.description: This individual is being assaulted by waking nightmares, forcing their consciousness deep into darkness.

HediffDef.label: Resisting Darkness
HediffDef.description: This individual is fighting their inner demons, for the time being...

HediffDef.label: Dementia
HediffDef.description: Frequently causes a target to become confused.

HediffDef.label: Dizzy
HediffDef.description: The target is reeling from a blow to the head, potentially causing confusion.

HediffDef.label: Side Effects
HediffDef.description: Side effects of an administered drug are causing a light brain fog in the target.

HediffDef.label: Side Effects
HediffDef.description: Side effects of an administered drug are causing a light brain fog in the target.

HediffDef.label: Side Effects
HediffDef.description: Side effects of an administered drug are causing a light brain fog in the target.

HediffDef.label: Antidepressants
HediffDef.description: Antidepressants are lightening the mood and clearing up the mind.

HediffDef.label: Antidepressants
HediffDef.description: Antidepressants are lightening the mood and clearing up the mind. They have minor side effects, however, often manifesting as slight brain fog or clumsiness.

HediffDef.label: Antidepressants
HediffDef.description: Antidepressants are lightening the mood and clearing up the mind. They have minor side effects, however, often manifesting as slight brain fog or clumsiness.

HediffDef.label: Antidepressants
HediffDef.description: Antidepressants are lightening the mood and clearing up the mind.

HediffDef.label: Thermoregulatory Supplements
HediffDef.description: Thermoregulatory supplements are increasing the body's resistance to extreme temperatures.

HediffDef.label: Barkskin
HediffDef.description: Magical bark covering the body is increasing defense to physical attacks, but creating a susceptibility to heat damage.

HediffDef.label: Frost Armor
HediffDef.description: This unit is encased in an armor of magical frost, increasing armor values and providing a small regenerative effect as long as the armor is active. The armor also grants extreme resistance against flames and heat.

HediffDef.label: Spell-resistant
HediffDef.description: The Atronach possesses heightened natural resistance to most types of non-elemental magic.

HediffDef.label: Lesser Ward
HediffDef.description: A magical buff is temporarily granting slight increases to defense.

HediffDef.label: Ward
HediffDef.description: A magical buff is temporarily granting moderate increases to defense.

HediffDef.label: Greater Ward
HediffDef.description: A magical buff is temporarily granting moderate increases to defense.

HediffDef.label: Omni-Ward
HediffDef.description: A nearly impenetrable magical ward is granting vastly increased defenses, deflecting most damage.

HediffDef.label: Arm Block
HediffDef.description: The pawn is trying to block attacks with a raised arm. Anything that hits them will really hurt!

HediffDef.label: Defensive Stance
HediffDef.description: The pawn has entered a cautious, defensive stance, reducing incoming damage.

HediffDef.label: Veteran's Stance
HediffDef.description: The pawn has entered a practiced defensive stance, greatly reducing incoming damage.

HediffDef.label: Defiant Stance
HediffDef.description: The pawn has entered a perfect stance, becoming a whirlwind of death on the battlefield.

HediffDef.label: Archmage's Absolution
HediffDef.description: The pawn is swathed in unbelievable amounts of mana, granting complete invulnerability against damage for a brief time.

HediffDef.label: Serenity
HediffDef.description: Attunement with the flow of the world can only lead to serenity.

HediffDef.label: Flowing stance
HediffDef.description: Be like water, my friend.

HediffDef.label: Temperance
HediffDef.description: The Samurai has entered a state of intense focus, granting greatly reduced casting time for a short time.

HediffDef.label: Sheltron
HediffDef.description: The pawn has taken on a defensive stance, blocking most incoming attacks for a brief moment.

HediffDef.label: Brawling Block
HediffDef.description: Float like a butterfly.

HediffDef.label: Extra Guard
HediffDef.description: The Scrapper is continuing to move defensively after recently entering a brawling block.

HediffDef.label: Footwork
HediffDef.description: Sting like a bee.

HediffDef.label: Flurry
HediffDef.description: Everybody has a plan. Until they get punched in the mouth.

HediffDef.label: Winded
HediffDef.description: The pawn is winded from getting punched, dulling their reaction speed and offensive stats.

HediffDef.label: Fists of Fury
HediffDef.description: This unit's blows crush through armor like paper.

HediffDef.label: Blast Shield
HediffDef.description: Utilizing explosive energy to mitigate incoming damage.

HediffDef.label: Blast Shield (I)
HediffDef.description: Utilizing explosive energy to mitigate incoming damage.

HediffDef.label: Blast Shield (II)
HediffDef.description: Utilizing explosive energy to mitigate incoming damage.

HediffDef.label: Blast Shield (III)
HediffDef.description: Utilizing explosive energy to mitigate incoming damage.

HediffDef.label: Chain Ward
HediffDef.description: Chains wrapped around the body's weakspots are reducing incoming damage.

HediffDef.label: Rampaging
HediffDef.description: The pawn is rampaging around from recently going berserk.

HediffDef.label: Berserk
HediffDef.description: The pawn is flying into a blind rage!

HediffDef.label: Terrified
HediffDef.description: The pawn is going to flee for their lives!

HediffDef.label: Minor Wound
HediffDef.description: A minor wound on the body is causing a small amount of bleeding.

HediffDef.label: Heartpiercer
HediffDef.description: A gaping wound is causing immense bleeding.

HediffDef.label: Heartpiercer
HediffDef.description: A gaping wound is causing immense bleeding.

HediffDef.label: Bloodspill
HediffDef.description: Numerous cuts to the body are causing extreme bleeding.

HediffDef.label: Bloodspill
HediffDef.description: Numerous cuts to the body are causing extreme bleeding.

HediffDef.label: Bloodspill
HediffDef.description: Numerous cuts to the body are causing extreme bleeding.

HediffDef.label: Bloodspill
HediffDef.description: Numerous cuts to the body are causing extreme bleeding.

HediffDef.label: Bloodspill
HediffDef.description: Numerous cuts to the body are causing extreme bleeding.

HediffDef.label: Bloodspill
HediffDef.description: Numerous cuts to the body are causing extreme bleeding.

HediffDef.label: Fleeing
HediffDef.description: The pawn is fleeing for their lives!
The pawn has lost touch with reality and is seeing and interacting with things that don't exist.
The pawn is in a state of inconsolable depression, and is wandering around aimlessly.

HediffDef.label: Hallucinating
HediffDef.description: The pawn's mind has been warped by drugs, severely impacting their mental state.

HediffDef.label: Wail Of Doom
HediffDef.description: The pawn's mind is under the corrupting influence of dark magic, severely impacting their mental state.

HediffDef.label: Fire At Will
HediffDef.description: Double time it!

HediffDef.label: Grand Finale
HediffDef.description: The stage is set. One last dance, before the curtain call!

HediffDef.label: Blessing of Fury
HediffDef.description: A Rune Knight has blessed this target with alacrity, greatly increasing their combat stats for a short time.

HediffDef.label: Windstep
HediffDef.description: Magical winds are guiding this pawn's actions, drastically increasing their speed and accuracy.

HediffDef.label: Tailwind
HediffDef.description: Magical winds are enhancing this pawn's abilities.

HediffDef.label: Last Gasp
HediffDef.description: This unit will die when this status ends.

HediffDef.label: Exploding Heart
HediffDef.description: You're already dead.

HediffDef.label: Chilled
HediffDef.description: Magical frost on the body is inhibiting movement and numbing extremities.

HediffDef.label: Poisoned
HediffDef.description: The pawn has been poisoned, causing labored breathing and weakened circulation.

HediffDef.label: Rot
HediffDef.description: Rot is a toxic substance which is an amalgam of various highly addictive drugs. Rot grants movement speed, armor, damage reduction, and melee stats, which increases with every 10 Rot. At 90 Rot, the bonuses sharply increase, but the pawn's body will begin breaking down, taking damage over time until Rot falls under 90. Rot does not decay on its own over time and must be slowly vented out with certain abilities.

HediffDef.label: Exhaust Fumes
HediffDef.description: An augmented body part vents exhaust fumes from this pawn pawn. Too much Rot will overload the circulation systems, causing the pawn to start taking periodic damage.

HediffDef.label: Poison Arrow
HediffDef.description: The target has been shot by a poisonous arrow, causing dizziness and making it difficult to breathe.

HediffDef.label: Bloom Poison
HediffDef.description: The target has been inflicted by a fast-acting poison, impairing the faculties. Higher severities will cause periodic organ damage. An extreme overload of this toxin will be instantly lethal.

HediffDef.label: Scanned
HediffDef.description: A keen spotter has called out this target's weaknesses, temporarily increasing damage dealt for a moderate duration.

HediffDef.label: Marked For Death
HediffDef.description: A Deadeye has marked this target for death, greatly increasing their damage taken.

HediffDef.label: Exposed
HediffDef.description: An expertly-aimed arrow has exposed the weaknesses in this pawn's armor.

HediffDef.label: Cracked Armor
HediffDef.description: A devastating blow has crushed the armor of this pawn, exposing multiple weak spots.

HediffDef.label: Pick Clean
HediffDef.description: A miner has picked apart the armor of this pawn, increasing their damage taken for a short time.

HediffDef.label: Crushed Armor
HediffDef.description: A devastating body blow has crushed the armor of this pawn, exposing multiple weak spots.

HediffDef.label: Thundercloud
HediffDef.description: Magical lightning has electrified this target, amplifying all further damage towards them.

HediffDef.label: Electrified
HediffDef.description: Magical lightning has electrified this target, amplifying all further damage towards them.

HediffDef.label: Shredded
HediffDef.description: The target has been shredded by solidified light, exposing them to further heat-based damage.

HediffDef.label: Constant Vomiting
HediffDef.description: I can't stop vomiting.

HediffDef.label: Identified
HediffDef.description: A Scholar has identified glaring weaknesses in this target, greatly reducing their resistances and increasing their damage taken.

HediffDef.label: Pierced
HediffDef.description: A Dragoon has pierced this target's defenses, greatly reducing their sharp defense and increasing their damage taken.

HediffDef.label: Inoculated
HediffDef.description: The pawn has been forcibly dosed with drugs, boosting their immune system and reducing their sensitivity to pain.

HediffDef.label: Agonizing pain
HediffDef.description: The pawn is experiencing agonizing pain after being operated on without anesthetics.

HediffDef.label: Tainted Blood
HediffDef.description: The pawn has received a transfusion of tainted blood.

HediffDef.label: Enhanced Blood
HediffDef.description: The pawn has received a transfusion of enhanced blood, granting slightly increased blood circulation.

HediffDef.label: Clarion Call
HediffDef.description: The pawn is energized from hearing the call of a hunting horn.

HediffDef.label: Crippled
HediffDef.description: The pawn has been temporarily crippled by an arrow shot through the leg.

HediffDef.label: Super Speed
HediffDef.description: A burst of energy is causing this pawn to move at incredible speeds.

HediffDef.label: Rocket Boots
HediffDef.description: Worn rocket boots are propelling this pawn at insane speeds.

HediffDef.label: Qilin Stance
HediffDef.description: Attunement with the aspect of the Qilin is granting increased resistance and recovery against disease and toxins, resistance to extreme temperatures, and a reprieve from pain, at the cost of increased susceptibility to direct damage.

HediffDef.label: Turtle Stance
HediffDef.description: Attunement with the aspect of the Turtle is granting increased defensive capabilities, at the cost of reduced offense and mobility.

HediffDef.label: Phoenix Stance
HediffDef.description: Attunement with the aspect of the Phoenix is increasing movement speed and sight.

HediffDef.label: Dragon Stance
HediffDef.description: Attunement with the temperamental aspect of the Dragon is granting increased melee capabilities, but also increased sensitivity to many things.

HediffDef.label: Ascended Stance
HediffDef.description: Perfect harmony in the body has allowed for attunement to all four celestial spirits, granting enhanced versions of all of their benefits and none of their downsides for a brief time.

HediffDef.label: Ascended Stance (I)
HediffDef.description: Perfect harmony in the body has allowed for attunement to all four celestial spirits, granting enhanced versions of all of their benefits and none of their downsides for a brief time.

HediffDef.label: Ascended Stance (II)
HediffDef.description: Perfect harmony in the body has allowed for attunement to all four celestial spirits, granting enhanced versions of all of their benefits and none of their downsides for a brief time.

HediffDef.label: Ascended Stance (III)
HediffDef.description: Perfect harmony in the body has allowed for attunement to all four celestial spirits, granting enhanced versions of all of their benefits and none of their downsides for a brief time.

HediffDef.label: Mean Words
HediffDef.description: The pawn has received some mean words from someone, making their day a tiny bit worse.

HediffDef.label: Berated
HediffDef.description: The pawn has received some harsh words from a someone, making them feel kind of bad.

HediffDef.label: Kind Words
HediffDef.description: The pawn has gotten a kind word from an ally, making their day a tiny bit better.

HediffDef.label: Praised
HediffDef.description: The pawn has received some praise, making their day a little better for awhile.

HediffDef.label: Motivated
HediffDef.description: The pawn has been recognized for their accomplishments, improving their mood for awhile.

HediffDef.label: Motivated
HediffDef.description: The pawn has received some powerful, motivating words from an ally, making their day a lot better.

HediffDef.label: Cheered
HediffDef.description: The pawn has received a cheering fanfare from a valued ally, making their day really great.

HediffDef.label: Energized
HediffDef.description: The galvanizing words of an ally have energized this pawn, pushing them past their normal abilities.

HediffDef.label: Limit Breaking
HediffDef.description: The earnest cheering of a stalwart ally is pushing this pawn to break their limits.

HediffDef.label: Natural Talent
HediffDef.description: The pawn will struggle at first, but eventually, their natural talent will shine through over time.

HediffDef.label: Special Ammo
HediffDef.description: Ammo for special attacks.

li.regenPerTickUpgradeName: medical supplies are not meant to regen

HediffDef.label: Channeling
HediffDef.description: The Red Mage is channeling their energy, granting them vastly increased stamina and mana regeneration at the cost of greatly reduced mobility and increased susceptibility to damage.

HediffDef.label: Reckless Charge
HediffDef.description: The Berserker is charging recklessly, gaining increased movement speed for the duration.

HediffDef.label: Unsteady
HediffDef.description: The Berserker is a little unsteady on their feet and will stumble soon.

HediffDef.label: Stifled
HediffDef.description: The target has had the air collapsed around them, reducing their ability to move and making it hard to breathe.

HediffDef.label: Razor Winds
HediffDef.description: The pawn is being held in place by magical winds.

HediffDef.label: Knocked Down
HediffDef.description: The pawn has been temporarily knocked down.

HediffDef.label: Shadow Fetters
HediffDef.description: The pawn's shadow has been restrained, immobilizing them.

HediffDef.label: Earthen Grit
HediffDef.description: Wardens naturally attune themselves towards earthen forces at all times, granting them increased health regeneration.

HediffDef.label: Fetal Pose
HediffDef.description: The pawn is in curled up in a fetal pose, praying that no one will hurt them.

HediffDef.label: Tased
HediffDef.description: The pawn is suffering from extreme pain and reduced respiratory functions due to being tased.

HediffDef.label: Disposable Goggles
HediffDef.description: They do something!

HediffDef.label: Shadowed
HediffDef.description: The pawn is being aided by a Ninja's shadow, obscuring them from normal sight and granting increased attack speed for a brief period of time.

HediffDef.label: Explosive Augments
HediffDef.description: Explosive augments (extremely illegal, even on most Rimworlds) are granting this pawn the explosive capabilities of a Railbreaker, a derogatory name for someone who roams Rimworlds and explodes structures they come across to get at the raw materials within.

HediffDef.label: Stealth
HediffDef.description: The pawn has disappeared into the shadows, becoming undetectable by most enemies.

HediffDef.label: Distortion
HediffDef.description: The pawn is bending light and space around them, gaining stealth and becoming undetectable by most enemies. Each of their strides also seem to take them farther and faster than they should.

HediffDef.label: Repositioning
HediffDef.description: The pawn is repositioning and has gained a small burst of movement speed for a short time.

HediffDef.label: Repositioning
HediffDef.description: The pawn is repositioning and has gained a small burst of movement speed for a short time.

HediffDef.label: Repositioning
HediffDef.description: The pawn is repositioning and has gained a small burst of movement speed for a short time.

HediffDef.label: Dazed
HediffDef.description: Something has dazed this pawn, greatly increasing the time it takes for them to aim and cast abilities for a brief time.

HediffDef.label: Repositioning
HediffDef.description: The Ambusher is repositioning and has gained a small burst of movement speed for a short time.

HediffDef.label: Cloak and Dagger
HediffDef.description: The Ambusher has camoflaged themselves into the background, becoming unseen to most enemies at the cost of greatly reduced aiming and movement speed.

HediffDef.label: Cloak and Dagger (I)
HediffDef.description: The Ambusher has camoflaged themselves into the background, becoming unseen to most enemies at the cost of greatly reduced aiming and movement speed.

HediffDef.label: Cloak and Dagger (II)
HediffDef.description: The Ambusher has camoflaged themselves into the background, becoming unseen to most enemies at the cost of greatly reduced aiming and movement speed.

HediffDef.label: Cloak and Dagger (III)
HediffDef.description: The Ambusher has camoflaged themselves into the background, becoming unseen to most enemies at the cost of greatly reduced aiming and movement speed.

HediffDef.label: Marksman's Focus
HediffDef.description: The pawn's focus is heightened, lowering aiming time and increasing accuracy.

HediffDef.label: Marksman's Vow
HediffDef.description: The pawn's focus is heightened, lowering aiming time and increasing accuracy.

HediffDef.label: Aether
HediffDef.description: The Gunbreaker has recently loaded a cartridge with aether, and their body is suffused with leftover energy for a short time.

HediffDef.label: Martial Spirit
HediffDef.description: The Striker is pumped up for a brief time after opening their chakras.

HediffDef.label: Martial Training
HediffDef.description: A small bout of exercise has given this pawn a pep in their step for a short while.

HediffDef.label: Magic Training
HediffDef.description: Minor arcane incantations have cleared the mind of this pawn, granting them small stat bonuses for a moderate duration.

HediffDef.label: Creation Wisdom
HediffDef.description: Minor arcane incantations have cleared the mind of this pawn, granting them small stat bonuses for a moderate duration.

HediffDef.label: Vengeance
HediffDef.description: The pawn has pushed past the limits of their body and is making a brief stand with the last of their energy.

HediffDef.label: Effulgence
HediffDef.description: The pawn is burning through their vital energies to fuel a final barrage of spells before they fall unconscious.

HediffDef.label: Superbolide
HediffDef.description: The Gunbreaker refuses to give up and has called upon the last of their energy to make a stand.

HediffDef.label: Exhaustion
HediffDef.description: The pawn has pushed their body beyond its limits and is suffering the consequences.

HediffDef.label: Waning Vitality
HediffDef.description: The pawn has burned through their body's vital energies and is suffering the consequences.

HediffDef.label: Enervated
HediffDef.description: The Gunbreaker has pushed their body beyond its limits and is suffering the consequences.

HediffDef.label: Shield Stance
HediffDef.description: The Gladiator has entered a blocking stance, reducing their movement speed and accuracy but gaining increased defenses for a short time.

HediffDef.label: Choked
HediffDef.description: The pawn is being choked by a length of rope.

HediffDef.label: Hunter Roast
HediffDef.description: A hearty meal is boosting the combat stats of this pawn for a short time.

HediffDef.label: The Hunter
HediffDef.description: The pawn has been blessed with the sign of the Hunter.

HediffDef.label: The Whirlwind
HediffDef.description: The pawn has been blessed by the sign of the Whirlwind.

HediffDef.label: The Hearth
HediffDef.description: The pawn has been blessed by the sign of the Hearth.

HediffDef.label: The Forge
HediffDef.description: The pawn has been blessed by the sign of the Forge.

HediffDef.label: The Scholar
HediffDef.description: The pawn has been blessed by the sign of the Scholar.

HediffDef.label: The Ewer
HediffDef.description: The pawn has been blessed by the sign of the Ewer.

HediffDef.label: The Soldier
HediffDef.description: The pawn has been blessed by the sign of the Soldier.

HediffDef.label: Black Star
HediffDef.description: A black star is casting a dread omen over this pawn...

HediffDef.label: Slowed
HediffDef.description: This pawn is stumbling around from having sharp objects thrown at their feet.

HediffDef.label: Slowed
HediffDef.description: This pawn is temporarily slowed from having a heavy object thrown into them.

HediffDef.label: Absolution
HediffDef.description: The pawn has been blasted by light energy, exposing vulnerabilities.

HediffDef.label: Disarmed
HediffDef.description: The pawn has been disarmed.

HediffDef.label: Soul Sacrificed
HediffDef.description: The pawn has had their soul sacrificed for another.

HediffDef.label: Quelling Strikes
HediffDef.description: The Troubadour has greatly increased their shooting and casting speed for a short time.

HediffDef.label: Reprisal
HediffDef.description: The Warrior has entered a disciplined stance, increasing their melee stats and reducing their damage taken for a short time.

HediffDef.label: Vow Of Silence
HediffDef.description: The Spellbreaker has undertaken a vow of silence, disabling their abilities for a brief time and decreasing their offensive stats, but granting them large resistances to damage.

HediffDef.label: Shadowbite
HediffDef.description: The pawn's shadow has been pinned by an arrow, massively slowing them for a short time.

HediffDef.label: Shadowbind
HediffDef.description: The pawn is being held down by ethereal shadows, massively slowing them and increasing their damage taken.

HediffDef.label: Aura of Light
HediffDef.description: The pawn is suffused with light, granting a bonus to mana regeneration, consciousness, shooting and casting speed, and psychic sensitivity.

HediffDef.label: Wreath of Darkness
HediffDef.description: The pawn is shrouded in shadow, gaining large resistances to damage as well as a persistent health regeneration effect.

HediffDef.label: Mana Regeneration
HediffDef.description: Natural mana regeneration rate is doubled.

HediffDef.label: Mana Regeneration
HediffDef.description: Natural mana regeneration rate is greatly increased for a short time.

HediffDef.label: Stamina Regeneration
HediffDef.description: Base stamina regeneration rate is increased.

HediffDef.label: Stamina Regeneration
HediffDef.description: Stamina Regeneration is greatly increased for a short time.

HediffDef.label: Stamina Increase
HediffDef.description: Maximum stamina is increased.

HediffDef.label: Cheap Shot
HediffDef.description: A cheap shot to a vulnerable area is causing immense pain to this pawn.

HediffDef.label: Thunderblessed
HediffDef.description: As a Thunderblessed, this pawn runs and acts faster than others, but is much more susceptible to bleeding out due to how their quickly their body functions.

HediffDef.label: Kneeling
HediffDef.description: The Deadeye has bunkered down at their current location, gaining bonuses to shooting at the cost of greatly reduced movement speed.

HediffDef.label: Kneeling
HediffDef.description: The Deadeye has bunkered down at their current location, gaining bonuses to shooting at the cost of greatly reduced movement speed.

HediffDef.label: Kneeling
HediffDef.description: The Deadeye has bunkered down at their current location, gaining bonuses to shooting at the cost of greatly reduced movement speed.

HediffDef.label: Kneeling
HediffDef.description: The Deadeye has bunkered down at their current location, gaining bonuses to shooting at the cost of greatly reduced movement speed.

HediffDef.label: Bullet Time
HediffDef.description: A gunner has revved up their barrels and is ready to mow down their opponents.

HediffDef.label: Inertia
HediffDef.description: Something has inflicted an unnatural malaise on this target, temporarily draining and disabling their stamina pool.

HediffDef.label: Illusion of Pain
HediffDef.description: The pawn is under the illusion that they are in pain.

HediffDef.label: Blackout
HediffDef.description: A hex cast by a mage has utterly debilitated this pawn, preventing them from even lifting a weapon.

HediffDef.label: Photon Forge
HediffDef.description: The Holosmith has activated their Photon Forge, empowering them for a short time.

HediffDef.label: Cold Open
HediffDef.description: The Holosmith is moderating the strength of their Photon Forge, granting them limited access to their abilities.

HediffDef.label: Pitch Perfect
HediffDef.description: The Troubadour has strummed their bow and is ready to support their allies with song.

HediffDef.label: Impromptu
HediffDef.description: The Troubadour is making up melodies on the fly, enabling their stamina pool but at a reduced capacity.

HediffDef.label: Sword Oath
HediffDef.description: The Guardian has empowered their sword arm with magic, increasing their chance to hit and enabling their stamina abilities.

HediffDef.label: Syphon Strike
HediffDef.description: The pawn is rapidly regenerating mana for a short time.

HediffDef.label: Action Surge
HediffDef.description: The pawn is rapidly regenerating stamina for a short time.

HediffDef.label: Brotherhood
HediffDef.description: The encouragement of an ally is invigorating this pawn, rapidly regenerating their stamina for a short time.

HediffDef.label: Fired Up
HediffDef.description: The pawn is fired up after eating some super-spicy food!

HediffDef.label: Blood of the Dragon
HediffDef.description: The Dragoon has harnessed draconic forces, temporarily empowering themselves.

HediffDef.label: Endure Pain
HediffDef.description: The pawn refuses to back down, and is temporarily immune to pain and bleeding out.

HediffDef.label: Living Dead
HediffDef.description: The Shadowbringer has chained their spirit to this mortal coil, granting them immunity to pain and bleeding out.

HediffDef.label: Energy Surge
HediffDef.description: The Dragoon is rapidly regenerating stamina for a short time.

HediffDef.label: Umbral Ice
HediffDef.description: Attunement to the elemental aspect of ice has increased the Black Mage's maximum mana.

HediffDef.label: Umbral Heart
HediffDef.description: The Black Mage is regenerating mana for a short time after casting a spell attuned to the element of ice. Casting any fire-attuned spell will reduce the duration of this buff.

HediffDef.label: Astral Fire
HediffDef.description: Attunement to the elemental aspect of fire has increased the Black Mage's ability damage and casting speed, but decreased their mana regeneration.

HediffDef.label: Requiescat
HediffDef.description: The Guardian has enhanced their focus, allowing them to cast faster for a short time, as well as increasing the damage of their offensive spells.

HediffDef.label: Exhausted
HediffDef.description: The Black Mage is momentarily exhausted from casting a massive spell.

HediffDef.label: Drained
HediffDef.description: The Black Mage is drained from casting a massive spell and cannot recover mana for some time.

HediffDef.label: Drained
HediffDef.description: The pawn is drained from casting a massive spell and cannot recover mana for some time.

HediffDef.label: Runes
HediffDef.description: The Rune Knight stores mana into runes for later use.

HediffDef.label: Nanite Bullets
HediffDef.description: The Mech Hunter periodically stores a Nanite Bullet, a deadly projectile that tears through Mechanoids and humanoids alike.

HediffDef.label: Cartridge
HediffDef.description: The Gunbreaker utilizes cartridges of condensed energy to for their most powerful abilities.

HediffDef.label: Shells
HediffDef.description: The Gunslinger prepares and carries special shells which allow them to fire devastating attacks in quick succession.

HediffDef.label: Acidosis
HediffDef.description: The Ravenous builds up acid in its body by feeding on various things. Acidosis empowers their body, granting them a small amount of damage reduction for every ten stacks. Acidosis builds up slowly over time, and is also gained via some of the Ravenous's abilities.

HediffDef.label: Charging Up
HediffDef.description: The Gunbreaker is charging up, granting rapid stamina gain for a short time.

HediffDef.label: Brutal Shell
HediffDef.description: The pawn has been shot with an electrified projectile, massively slowing them for a short time.

HediffDef.label: Jump Shot
HediffDef.description: Momentary invulnerability.

HediffDef.label: Stardiver
HediffDef.description: Momentary invulnerability.

HediffDef.label: Dragonfire Dive
HediffDef.description: Momentary invulnerability.

HediffDef.label: Chem Charge
HediffDef.description: Momentary damage reduction.

HediffDef.label: Onslaught
HediffDef.description: Momentary invulnerability.

HediffDef.label: Inner Chaos
HediffDef.description: Momentary invulnerability.

HediffDef.label: Upheaval
HediffDef.description: Momentary invulnerability.

HediffDef.label: Delirium
HediffDef.description: The target has been cursed by dark magic, causing them to rapidly hemorrhage blood.

HediffDef.label: Circle of Scorn
HediffDef.description: Light magic is exposing the worthy and punishing the wicked.

HediffDef.label: Circle of Scorn
HediffDef.description: Light magic is exposing the worthy and punishing the wicked.

HediffDef.label: Condensed Light
HediffDef.description: A shield of condensed light is blocking most incoming damage for a short time.

HediffDef.label: Lifespill
HediffDef.description: The pawn has been cursed, causing even the smallest bleeding wounds to hemorrhage blood for a short time.

HediffDef.label: Holmgang
HediffDef.description: The Warrior has braced themselves with chains for an incoming assault, significantly reducing incoming damage for a short time.

HediffDef.label: Holmgang
HediffDef.description: The Warrior has braced themselves with chains for an incoming assault, significantly reducing incoming damage for a short time.

HediffDef.label: Holmgang
HediffDef.description: The Warrior has braced themselves with chains for an incoming assault, significantly reducing incoming damage for a short time.

HediffDef.label: Holmgang
HediffDef.description: The Warrior has braced themselves with chains for an incoming assault, significantly reducing incoming damage for a short time.

HediffDef.label: Petrified
HediffDef.description: The target has been petrified, immobilizing them, but rendering them immune to incoming damage.

HediffDef.label: Armor of Earth
HediffDef.description: The Warden has encased themselves in earthen armor, greatly reducing incoming damage for a short time, but also reducing their movement speed for the same duration.

HediffDef.label: Shimmer
HediffDef.description: An addictive, sweet-tasting combat drug is coursing through the system, greatly reducing incoming damage for a short time.

HediffDef.label: Dark Mind
HediffDef.description: The Shadowbringer is channeling dark energy, reducing incoming damage and increasing outgoing spell damage for a short time.

HediffDef.label: Slowed
HediffDef.description: Something has immensely weighed down this target, greatly slowing them.

HediffDef.label: Blocking
HediffDef.description: The target has been empowered, allowing them to effortlessly block incoming attacks for a short time.

HediffDef.label: Shredded
HediffDef.description: This unit's armor is being shredded.

HediffDef.label: Liquefy
HediffDef.description: Melting armor is providing a final moment of protection.

HediffDef.label: Consume
HediffDef.description: Momentary invulnerability.

HediffDef.label: Smoking Gun
HediffDef.description: Momentary invulnerability.

HediffDef.label: Abyssal Drain
HediffDef.description: Momentary invulnerability from draining life energy.

HediffDef.label: Heat
HediffDef.description: The Gunbreaker's body is retaining heat and toxins from recklessly using their body as an explosive conduit. At higher severities, the Gunbreaker will begin taking rapid damage to their internal organs, likely resulting in their death.

HediffDef.label: Spirit
HediffDef.description: Spirit.

HediffDef.label: Nebula
HediffDef.description: The Gunbreaker is utilizing explosive energy to grant themselves invulnerability and increased stats for a short time.

HediffDef.label: Aethercall
HediffDef.description: The Gunbreaker is channeling aether, granting them bonuses to melee stats and armor but rendering casting and shooting ineffective.

HediffDef.label: Nomad's Grit
HediffDef.description: The Nomad has focused their energy, granting them significant damage reduction and increases to combat stats for a short time.

HediffDef.label: Seed of Life
HediffDef.description: An infusion of herbs has granted this pawn enhanced regeneration and increased agility.

HediffDef.label: Battery Charge
HediffDef.description: Surging electricity is granting increased stamina regeneration and increased maximum stamina for a brief time.

HediffDef.label: Discharging
HediffDef.description: Electricity is being discharged, inducing stamina drain for a short time.

HediffDef.label: Recoil
HediffDef.description: Recoil from a powerful shot has temporarily drained this unit's stamina.

HediffDef.label: Reassemble
HediffDef.description: A gunner has revved up their barrels and is ready to mow down their opponents.

HediffDef.label: Reassemble
HediffDef.description: The Gunner has reassembled their weapon for a single perfect shot.

HediffDef.label: Reassemble
HediffDef.description: The Gunner has reassembled their weapon for a single perfect shot.

HediffDef.label: Reassemble
HediffDef.description: The Gunner has reassembled their weapon for a single perfect shot.

HediffDef.label: Reassemble
HediffDef.description: The Gunner has reassembled their weapon for a single perfect shot.

HediffDef.label: Nanites
HediffDef.description: Nanites are artificially boosting the target's defenses for a short time.

HediffDef.label: Serenade
HediffDef.description: This pawn is walking with a skip in their step after being personally serenaded.

HediffDef.label: Home Cooking
HediffDef.description: A home-cooked meal is reminding this pawn of home.

HediffDef.label: Satiated
HediffDef.description: A filling meal has satiated this pawn, reducing their need to eat for awhile.

HediffDef.label: Caffeinated
HediffDef.description: A cup of coffee is keeping this pawn going, temporarily reducing their need for sleep.

HediffDef.label: Throne of Gluttony
HediffDef.description: The Ravenous is somehow suppressing their need to sleep at the cost of increasing their hunger.

HediffDef.label: Green Card
HediffDef.description: A card drawn from a magical deck is enabling the stamina pool.

HediffDef.label: Blue Card
HediffDef.description: A card drawn from a magical deck is enabling the mana pool.

HediffDef.label: Brazen Prospector
HediffDef.description: The Miner is swiftly blasting away rock and ore, while paying little heed to mineral yield.

HediffDef.label: Guided Hands
HediffDef.description: The pawn has been blessed with arcane focus, greatly boosting their construction speed for a short time.

li.label: Black Star
li.description: I'm horribly unlucky today. I feel like I should have just stayed at home...

li.label: Serenade
li.description: That was some beautiful music. It soothed my soul.

li.label: Nostalgia
li.description: This food reminds me of home...

li.label: The Ewer
li.description: I feel like the stars are watching over me today.

li.label: Antidepressants
li.description: Everything seems so clear now. What was I so depressed about, anyway?

li.label: Mean Words
li.description: Someone said something kind of mean to me.

li.label: Berated
li.description: An enemy said something pretty horrible to me. I feel kinda bad.

li.label: Kind words
li.description: Someone said something sort of nice to me.

li.label: Motivated
li.description: An ally recently gave me some incredible praise.

li.label: Cheered
li.description: Someone cheered me on recently, I can't help but smile to myself everywhere I go.

li.label: Dragon's Indignation
li.description: I can feel all the impurities of the world with my body. It's almost like this existence isn't good enough for me any longer.
